text: Evan Peters (born January 20, 1987) is an American actor. He is known for his roles on American Horror Story series and his role of Stan Bowes in the first season of the FX drama Pose. He is also known for his role as mutant Quicksilver in the superhero movies X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014), X-Men: Apocalypse (2016), and Dark Phoenix (2019). In 2022, he portrayed serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer in the Netflix series Dahmer â€“ Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story. He won the Golden Globe for Best Actor and was also nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Michigan
